title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on first attempt in library outline view
description: Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, the item is not selected on the first attempt. Only on the second attempt is the item successfully selected. This issue occurs consistently.
OB: On the first attempt, when trying to select an item in the library outline view, the item is not selected.
EB: On the second attempt to select the item, it is successful in getting selected.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
3. Observe that the item is not selected on the first attempt.
4. Repeat the selection process for the same item.
5. Observe that the item is successfully selected on the second attempt.
